abilities.name: Amphibious Assault
abilities.effect: 1AP: Swim 6 inches through water or mist.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.effect: +1 to WS/BS within 3 inches of another Murloc.

abilities.name: Primitive Cunning
abilities.effect: Free Dash once per Turning Point when within 6 inches of Murloc King.

abilities.name: Crab Shell Shield
abilities.effect: Improve Save by 1. When retaliating, retain one failed attack dice as a success.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Push 2 inches all enemies within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Primitive Cunning
abilities.effect: Free Dash once per Turning Point when within 6 inches of Murloc King.

abilities.name: King’s Command
abilities.effect: Re-roll attack dice with result of 1 for Murlocs within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Push 2 inches all enemies within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Aether Dive
abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Primal Strength
abilities.effect: +1 Damage to successful Fight actions.

abilities.name: Aether Dive
abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly 7 over terrain.

abilities.name: Banner of Resilience
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6 inches reduce incoming damage by 1 (to a minimum of 2).

abilities.name: Aether Dive
abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Flute of Fury
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6 inches gain +1 to WS until the end of the Turning Point.

abilities.name: Aether Dive
abilities.effect: 1AP: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Primal Strength
abilities.effect: +1 Damage to successful Fight actions.

abilities.name: Combat Medicae
abilities.effect: 1AP: Heal 2D3 +2 wounds to a friendly operative within 3 inches.

abilities.name: Genetic Augmentation
abilities.effect: 1AP: Friendly operative within 6 inches +1 to WS until the end of apothecary next activation. Does not stack with other WS/BS modifiers.

abilities.name: Revitalizing Aura
abilities.effect: All friendly operatives within 3 inches reduce incoming damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

abilities.name: Desperate Charge
abilities.effect: Can perform two dash actions if it doesn't perform any actions other than dash and reposition during this activation and it has the engage order.

abilities.name: Mistforged Precision
abilities.effect: Re-roll one attack roll in mist zones.

abilities.name: Lancer’s Charge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Free Charge + Fight action.

abilities.name: Inspiring Presence
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6 inches re-roll 1s on attack rolls.

abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Warpfire Trail
abilities.effect: After moving, leave a 1inche-wide trail of warpfire. Enemies crossing it suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Aegis of the Ninefold Deceit
abilities.effect: Reduces by 1 (to a min of 2) damage received by visible friendly operatives within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Ethereal Form
abilities.effect: Remove this operative from the killzone at the end of the turning point.

abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Arcane Bargain
abilities.effect: Once per activation an enemy within control range, roll 1d6 and that enemy suffers result wounds and restore result wounds from friendly operative that it's both visible and within 4 inches, if an operative other than Summoner recovered wounds this way and Summoner is both visible and within 4 inches of this operative and that operative, restore result/2 wounds rounded up from Summoner.

abilities.name: Ethereal Form
abilities.effect: Remove this operative from the killzone at the end of the turning point.

abilities.name: Mark of Khorne
abilities.effect: Re-roll one attack die per activation in melee.

abilities.name: Warp-fueled Rage
abilities.effect: After defeating an enemy, gain +1 Attack next activation.

abilities.name: Dark Zeal
abilities.effect: Re-roll one attack or defense die per turning point.

abilities.name: Inspiring Terror
abilities.effect: Enemy operatives within 6 inches worsen their WS by 1.

abilities.name: Psychic Dominion
abilities.effect: 1AP: Cast Smite (10 inches range, 1D3 mortal wounds) or Warpfire (create a 3 inches hazardous terrain patch within 6 inches and visible).

abilities.name: Warpfire
abilities.effect: Enemies in or moving through Warpfire suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Malicious Volleys
abilities.effect: If stationary, shoot twice with the same weapon.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: 1AP: +1 Damage to next attack, but suffer 1 wound on a hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Mist Resilience
abilities.effect: In mist zones, gain Cover against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Combat Triage
abilities.effect: 1AP: Heal 2D3 +1 wounds to a friendly operative within 3 inches.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Push 2 inches all enemies within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Inspiring Presence
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6 inches re-roll 1s on attack rolls.

abilities.name: Markerlight
abilities.effect: 1AP: Designate a visible enemy. Allies gain Balanced against it until the end of the Turning Point.

abilities.name: Disgustingly Resilient
abilities.effect: Roll 1D6 each time this operative loses a wound. On a 5+, ignore that wound.

abilities.name: Swarm of Filth
abilities.effect: If another Nurgling is within 2 inches, improve WS by 1 for melee attacks.

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.effect: When this operative is destroyed, all enemies within 2 inches suffer 1 wound.

abilities.name: Terminator Armor
abilities.effect: Ignore movement penalties from terrain. Reduce damage taken from Blast weapons by 1 (to a min of 1).

abilities.name: Overclocked Systems
abilities.effect: Once per battle: Gain +1 APL for one activation. After this activation, suffer 1 wound.

abilities.name: Bulky Frame
abilities.effect: Cannot climb or perform Dash actions. Enemy operatives cannot move through this operative.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.effect: 1AP: Teleport 6 inches through shadows or mist zones. Treat as **Concealed** after teleporting.

abilities.name: Soul Hunger
abilities.effect: After defeating an enemy, heal 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Umbral Aura
abilities.effect: Enemies within 6 inches worsen their Save by 1 in mist zones.

abilities.name: Terrifying Visage
abilities.effect: Once per battle: All enemies within 6 inches gain **Disoriented** (ID 8) until the end of the Turning Point.

abilities.name: Veil of Darkness
abilities.effect: 1AP: Create a 3 inch mist zone. Allies within it gain **Silent** (weapon rule).

abilities.name: Siphon Essence
abilities.effect: PSYCHIC: 1AP: Target enemy within 12 inches suffers 1D3 wounds. Heal equal to the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Living Roots
abilities.effect: 1AP: Create a 3-inch hazardous terrain patch of entangling roots. Enemies moving through suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Bark Armor
abilities.effect: Reduce incoming damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1). Critical hits against this operative are scored on unmodified rolls of 5+.

abilities.name: Sylvan Regrowth
abilities.effect: At the end of each Turning Point, heal 1D3 wounds. If in a mist zone, heal 1D3+1 instead.

abilities.name: Mistform
abilities.effect: This operative is always treated as in Cover while in a mist zone. Can move through terrain and other operatives.

abilities.name: Density Shift
abilities.effect: 1AP: Increase mist density level in a 6-inch radius for one Turning Point. All operatives in the area gain **Obscured**.

abilities.name: Ethereal Strike
abilities.effect: Critical hits inflict the **Bleeding** (ID 2) status. If the target is already Bleeding, worsen it to **Corrupted** (ID 7).

abilities.name: Guardian's Call
abilities.effect: Once per battle, summon 1D3 **Sylvan Saplings** (PR 40) within 6 inches. Saplings activate after this operative.

abilities.name: Thorn Burst
abilities.effect: When this operative is destroyed, all enemies within 3 inches suffer 1D3 wounds and gain **Bleeding** (ID 2).

abilities.name: Mist Vortex
abilities.effect: At the start of its activation, pull all operatives within 6 inches 2 inches closer. Roll 1D6 for each; on a 1, they suffer 1 wound.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: PSYCHIC: 1AP: Create a 4-inch hazardous warp rift. Enemies entering or starting their activation in it suffer 1D6 wounds (6+ to avoid).

abilities.name: Unyielding Fog
abilities.effect: Mist zones within 12 inches cannot be dispersed. All mist effects are treated as Dense density.
